description:
T1 Yew Tree - fell & grind -REFUSED
T2 Plane Tree- pollard by taking 2-3 meters off all round -GRANTED
T3 Ash Tree - pollard by taking 2-3 meters off all round-GRANTED
decision_conditions: Grant with conditions: T2 and T3.
The works should be carried out to the latest requirement of British Standard 3998 "Recommendations for Tree Work".
Reason: To safeguard the trees in the interest of visual amenity | T1 Refuse:

1) No evidence has been provided to implicate individual trees in the alleged tree root damage. Low-rise structures, such as garden walls, driveways and footpaths, are usually constructed on shallow foundations that, over time, will distort and develop cracks and deformations. This will happen even in locations where trees are not present. Therefore, it is important that evidence is presented showing that it is, in fact, tree roots causing the damage.
2) No evidence has been provided with regards to damage to the building. The Tree Service requires at least 12 months of level monitoring
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
